structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Except as provided in KRS 96.550 to 96.900, any city utility shall have the same rights with respect to condemnation and eminent domain as given corporations and partnerships under KRS 278.502 and 416.130.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 46. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 1.
